Ferret
Reviewing Tabular Datasets for Manipulation
Devin Lange
Shaurya Sahai
Jeff M. Phillips
Alexander Lex
Ferret is a visualization tool, designed to make artifacts of manipulation in tabular datasets salient.
The following datasets are examples of real datasets that are associated with papers that have been retracted due to concerns with the data.
Click any of the datasets below to open them in Ferret.
Name Status Statement Domain Blog
DS-Priming Retracted 10.1007/s11002-016-9401-6 Marketing blog.openmktg.org/2021/07/retracted-article-why-money-meanings.html

10.1080/01973533.2015.1124767
DS-Driving Retracted 10.1073/pnas.2115397118 Psychology datacolada.org/98
